name: The Lost Kingdoms: A mobile RPG
name_original: The Lost Kingdoms: A mobile RPG
description:
The Lost Kingdoms : A mobile RPG is a free role playing game designed for Android / Fire phones. (Supporting builds: Armv5, Armv7, x86, Mips)

You wake up in a dark prison with no memory. Escape and try to find out who and why imprisoned you!

* Retro pixel art graphics and aesthetics with tile based movement and exploration.

* A time phased combat system that requires fast thinking at real time.

* Increase your strengths by learning and upgrading 12 different skills and by discovering powerful equipment and useful consumables.

* Live and read the progress of your story through the Journal Entries at four chapters.

* Game is 100% free, with no advertisements, no locked content or any online requirement.

Update 1.0.1 - Fixes minor bug that was removing "Poison" debuff at a successful "Kick" skill attack.

Update 1.0.2 - Fix an issue that some android devices had with the UI tapping. No gameplay changes!

Update 1.0.3 - Minor gameplay change for better balance (Inn resting cost reduced)
